channel.title: Hi I'm Andrew Gertig from Mutual and HumansWithKids.com
channel.description:
My name is Andrew and I'm building [Mutual](http://twitter.com/mutualapp) and [HumansWithKids](http://humanswithkids.com).
Mutual is an iOS app I am building with RubyMotion that helps you to better manage who you follow on Twitter.
HumansWithKids is a site focused on parenting that we hope to grow and expand by offering compelling content and resources.
I look forward to meeting and talking with you!

item.title: Hi I'm Andrew Gertig from Mutual and HumansWithKids.com
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Hi Andrew. Welcome to the forums!

Read full topic
